name: AstroPlatformer (itch)
description:
My 2D Platformer game following the CAS 117 tutorials with modifications.

My modifications:

- Design: 2 unique levels

- Aesthetic: redrew +animated the end goal portal, also drew +animated the moving spikes

- Gameplay: added a new obstacle - the moving spikes in level 2 that hurt you if you run into them

Credits:

Created by Zoie Tsoi
